body: These boots increase the wearer's base land speed by 10 feet. In addition to this striding ability (considered an enhancement bonus), these boots allow the wearer to make great leaps. She can jump with a +5 competence bonus on Acrobatics checks.
name: Boots of Striding and Springing
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Equipment/Rules/Wondrous Items/Feet/Feet Slot Wondrous Items/Boots of Striding and Springing
